user.title: Configure your Dynamic Energy Cost Integration
user.description: Select either a power sensor (W) or an energy sensor (kWh), along with the price sensor (EUR/kWh).

data.integration_description: Name to append the integration title
data.power_sensor: Power Usage Sensor Entity ID (W) - Optional if energy sensor is provided
data.energy_sensor: Energy Usage Sensor Entity ID (kWh) - Optional if power sensor is provided

error.invalid_config: Please choose either a power sensor or an energy sensor.
error.missing_sensor: Enter at least a power sensor or an energy sensor.

success.title: Success
success.description: Your Dynamic Energy Cost Integration is now configured.
